title: A Long hour's walk
creator_credit: Sumner J. Glimcher and International Film Foundation
brief_description: Father Rene Garcia walks through the outskirts of Bogota and discusses the poverty of both urban and rural Colombian working class. In the face of poverty, hunger, illness and premature death, can there still be hope?
creator_credit_for_label: Sumner J. Glimcher and International Film Foundation
